name: astro-photosuite
description: GLightbox-driven lightbox integration for Astro Markdown images.

scripts.build:css: sass src/styles/lightbox.scss dist/styles-lightbox.css --no-source-map && sass src/styles/img-descriptions.scss dist/styles-img-descriptions.css --no-source-map
scripts.build: npm run build:css && tsup src/index.ts src/rehype-glightbox-images.ts --format esm --dts --out-dir dist
